item.title: About
item.description:
Hello ! My name is Younes, also known as Loutre online.

I am a french engineering student and a cybersecurity enthousiast.
I started learning cybersecurity few months ago and I want to work in this domain. I am currently looking for an apprenticeship in cybersecurity to improve my knowledge and skills.

I am gonna post some writeups and new things I learn !

Here my accounts on RootMe, HackTheBox and TryHackMe.

item.title: Abstract Syntax Tree
item.description:
What is Abstract Syntax Tree ?

Here I will present to you the results of my research on AST, which helped me to solve the AST Deobfuscation challenge on RootMe.

Abstract Syntax Tree is a data structure to represent the structure of a program. It is a tree representation of the abstract syntax structure of text written in a formal language.

We call this structure “Abstract” because it does not show every details appearing in the original syntax.
